Posts.Content: Scarlettem  Hi Scarlett, I found that theses injections made me ache all over but didn't make me feel poorly. Id describe it like having a cross strapped to your back. It made my jaw, collarbone, spine and shoulders ache. I was taking codeine but didn't find it helped much. Speak to your chemo nurses to see if they can prescribe good pain meds for you. I would start my injections on the Sunday evening and the pain would start creeping in Tuesday afternoon. I found a nice hot bath helped as well. Just remember if you take codeine to make sure it doesn't bung you up. They may prescribe lactulose for you too as constipation is a common problem with codeine based meds
